channel.title: HLS on Awesome resources for Hardware Description
channel.description: Recent content in HLS on Awesome resources for Hardware Description

item.title: Parallel Programming for FPGAs
item.description: “Parallel Programming for FPGAs is an open-source book aimed at teaching hardware and software developers how to efficiently program FPGAs using high-level synthesis (HLS). The authors developed the book as we noticed a lack of material aimed at teaching people to effectively use HLS tools."
